moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: To clock out now leave Hours and Thru empty; specify Hours or Thru if your clock out time is in the past
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 现在要下班，不需要填写下班时间； 如果您的下班时间是过去的时间，请指定时间

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Are you sure? This will enable GL posting for this organization.
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: 你确定吗？这将启用该组织的总账过账。

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: ${uomId} - ${description} - Local Currency Amounts are calculated for each GL Transaction IF a current exchange rate is set in a UomConversion record between Base Currency and Local Currency
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: ${uomId} - ${description} - 如果在【单位转换】中设置了基础货币和当地货币之间的当前汇率，则会为每个总账交易计算当地货币金额
